text: just ordinary people at a bus stop this

escalates civilians are once again
coming under fire and as these scenes
show are suffering horribly they have
called me and told me my wife was killed
no I haven't seen what happened I just
came I saw them putting her into a car
that's all I've seen Ukraine's war with
pro-russian separatists shows no sign of

Kiev accuses Russia of stoking the
violence which Moscow denies but the

Ukrainian forces are on the defensive
Kiev officials announced they had lost

yesterday evening a decision was taken

this pullback has been agreed on before
